edu.jhu.zpalmer2.spring2009.ai.hw6.algorithm

Interface TransitionFunction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TerrainBasedTransitionFunction

    public interface TransitionFunction
extends java.io.Serializable
    Implementers of this interface provide a function for state transition in the reinforcement learning world.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Pair<State,java.lang.Double>> transition(State state, Action action)
      Provides legal transitions.

    • Method Detail

      • transition

        java.util.Set<Pair<State,java.lang.Double>> transition(State state,
                                                     Action action)
        Provides legal transitions.
        Parameters:
        state - The state in question.
        action - The action taken from that state.
        Returns:
        The possible outcomes of this transition. These are represented as a pairing between the outcome state and the probability of that outcome occurring.
